sentences.en: Almost any exhibition of complete self - sufficiency draws a stunned tribute from me.
sentences.cn: 这种几乎是完全我行我素的神情总是使我感到目瞪口呆,满心赞佩.

sentences.en: But love to God and man eclipsed by pride and self - sufficiency.
sentences.cn: 但爱上帝和爱人的心被骄傲自满的心所淹没了.

sentences.en: But throughout the colonies, people relied primarily on small farms and self - sufficiency .
sentences.cn: 但就整个殖民地来说, 人们主要依靠小型农场,过着 自给自足 的生活.

sentences.en: Encouraging self sufficiency at each stage of the disaster.
sentences.cn: 在洪灾的每个阶段都可以自给自足.

sentences.en: Firstly, strength and sufficiency and its feature were put forward and discussed.
sentences.cn: 首先, 提出了充要强度并讨论了它的性质.

sentences.en: He has a question of the sufficiency of the equipment.
sentences.cn: 他对设备是否够用表示怀疑.

sentences.en: His genial sufficiency was a taunt and a mockery to many.
sentences.cn: 他那么和蔼自满的态度,许多人都认为是一种辱骂和嘲弄.

sentences.en: Nowadays, IKEA is often seen as having connotations of self - sufficiency .
sentences.cn: 现在, “宜家”经常被视为具有 自给自足 的内涵.

sentences.en: Only Birkin kept the fear definitely off him, saved him his quick sufficiency in life.
sentences.cn: 只有伯金才能帮助他完全解脱恐惧, 使他避免迅速满足于自己的生活.

sentences.en: Our country has sufficiency of natural resources.
sentences.cn: 我国有足够的自然资源.

sentences.en: The purpose in all this is to achieve self - sufficiency .
sentences.cn: 凡此都是为了达到 自给自足 的目的.

sentences.en: The war has affected the country’s economic sufficiency.
sentences.cn: 战争已经影响到了这个国家的经济富足。

sentences.en: There's a sufficiency of drama in these lives to sustain your interest.
sentences.cn: 这些人的生活充满了戏剧性，总能让你兴趣盎然。

sentences.en: They have made great strides towards self - sufficiency .
sentences.cn: 他们在 自给自足 方面已取得了很大的进步.

sentences.en: Thus they separated their souls from God, and builtup - sufficiency.
sentences.cn: 这样,他们的心灵就与上帝隔离而走上骄傲自负的道路.

sentences.en: When foods from different plant sources are eaten together, deficiency in one is compensated for by sufficiency in another.
sentences.cn: 多种蔬果类食物一起吃的话，一种食物所缺乏的营养会由另一种富含该营养的食物予以补足。

trans.tran_en: the state of being or having enough
